project.description: This tasks automatically approves every pending client request.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
for client in ${SERVER_STORE_DIR}/clients/dataPath/*; do
client_file=`basename ${client}`
if [ ! -f "${SERVER_STORE_DIR}/clientApprovals/dataPath/${client_file}" ]; then
TIMESTAMP="`date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.000Z`" CLIENT_ID="`xmlstarlet sel -T -t -v "properties/entry[@key='client_id']" ${client}`"
sudo tee "${SERVER_STORE_DIR}/clientApprovals/dataPath/${client_file}" <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <comment>OA4MP stream store</comment> <entry key="approval_ts">${TIMESTAMP}</entry> <entry key="approver">admin</entry> <entry key="approved">true</entry> <entry key="client_id">${CLIENT_ID}</entry> </properties> EOF
fi
done
